name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SyncReads - one place for your web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync your favorite content for distraction-free reading, save time and replace multiple apps with SyncReads. Anytime, anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just CLICK & SYNC ✨

━ Features ━

💾 Save web articles, blog posts, emails and more… To read them offline and without distractions in YOUR favourite way.
📰 Read inside the app with distraction-free, fully customizable interface.
📡 Add feeds and sync newest content with minimal effort.
〽️ Track details in realtime with advanced logs.
📊 Get access to your syncing stats in dashboard.
👑 Create different forms for your various use cases, whether it be for work or personal purposes.

━ Usage ━

Start using SyncReads today for free! It is helping thousands of individuals everyday to be more productive and read without distractions in their personal and professional lives.

━ Contact ━

You have an issue or want to give a feedback / suggestion? Drop me an email 📬

━ Privacy ━

The extension doesn't collect any data unless you make an account. If you do, it may collect anonymous usage data to help us understand how you use the extension and what features we should work on first.
